      static SpriteSheet SpriteSheet.loadSpriteSheet(Texture tex, float divwidth)
      Slices the Texture tex up, cutting vertically every divwidth length.
      static SpriteSheet SpriteSheet.loadSpriteSheet(Texture tex, float divwidth, float divheight)
      Slices the Texture tex up, cutting vertically every divwidth length, and cutting horizontally every divheight length.
      static SpriteSheet SpriteSheet.loadSpriteSheet(Texture tex, SubTexture[] subtexs)
      Creates a spritesheet based off of a Texture tex, and a bunch of SubTextures.
